#summary PIE Function : Set

= PIE Function : Set=

Set is the command to assign a value to a variable. You can set a variabel to be a constant number (e.g. 4) or another variable

== Example ==


<font color = "blue">make</font> var1 

<font color = "blue">make</font> var2

<font color = "blue">set</font> var1 <font color = "blue">to</font> 4

<font color = "blue">set</font> var2 <font color = "blue">to</font> var1
